Definition: [C] The minimum value of a rolling 7-day minimum
[C] The maximum value of a rolling 7-day maximum
[C] The maximum value of a rolling 7-day average
[C] The maximum difference between the rolling 7-day maximum and minimum. I.e. the largest temperature swing within a 7-day period.
[C] The average difference between the rolling 7-day maximum and minimum. I.e. the average temperature swing within a 7-day period.
[days] The number of 7-day rolling averages that are greater than 30C
